meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of a vow or promise.
meanings.sent1: The couple exchanged votives promises during their wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful votives necklace to symbolize her commitment.
meanings.sent3: The votives agreement between friends was sealed with a pinky promise.
meanings.sent4: His votives dedication to his work was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The votives bond between siblings was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Objects offered or dedicated in fulfillment of a vow or pledge.
meanings.sent1: The temple was adorned with colorful votives candles.
meanings.sent2: She lit votives at the shrine as a sign of gratitude.
meanings.sent3: The votives gifts were carefully placed on the altar.
meanings.sent4: The votives offerings were a symbol of their devotion.
meanings.sent5: The votives statues were crafted with intricate details.
